keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
keywords.name: subject

lead_paragraph: Kwon Pyong, an ethnic Korean who studied in America, was taken into police custody after posting a selfie in which he wore a T-shirt that likened President Xi Jinping to Hitler.
snippet: Kwon Pyong, an ethnic Korean who studied in America, was taken into police custody after posting a selfie in which he wore a T-shirt that likened President Xi Jinping to Hitler....

headline.main: He Called China’s President ‘Xitler’ on Twitter. Now He Faces Prison.
headline.print_headline: He Combined ‘Xi’ With ‘Hitler’ on Twitter. Now He Faces Prison Time.
